response: The luxurious cabin aboard our cruise liner offers guests the ultimate comfort and convenience. The Yamaha HTR-5660 6-Channel Digital Home Theater Receiver allows you to enjoy your favorite movies or music in stunning surround sound quality. With its 85 watts per channel power, this receiver will fill any space with rich, vibrant sound. For those who want even more control over their listening experience, the receiver also has 6.1-channel discrete 6.1, matrix 6.1, and DTS Neo:6 decoders so you can customize your sound exactly how you like it. Additionally, the receiver comes equipped with 24 distinct sound programs and 44 variations to ensure that no matter what type of movie or music you are enjoying, it sounds just right. To make sure you never miss out on anything, there are five S-Video inputs and two outputs, four optical and one coaxial digital inputs, and a set of front panel A/V inputs. All of which allow you to connect multiple devices at once without having to worry about losing signal quality. If you’re looking for something truly special, then look no further than the Sony KV-20FV12 20” Trinitron Wega Flat-Screen TV. This television boasts a 20-inch screen size and a Trinitron flat picture tube for crystal clear images. It also includes a 3-line digital comb filter to improve image resolution and clarity, making everything from sports games to dramas come alive before your eyes. In addition, the SpeedSurf rapid channel surfing feature makes finding your desired program quicker and easier than ever before. You can also save up to five of your most frequently watched channels for easy access later. Finally, the Sony KV-20FV12 20” Trinitron Wega Flat-Screen TV also comes with a built-in 10-watt DAC speaker system (5 watts x 2) with Matrix Surround and MTS decoder for full, immersive sound. No matter where you sit in the cabin, you won’t be disappointed when watching your favorite shows or movies. Lastly, if you find yourself wanting to watch something but don’t feel like getting off the couch, the GE AV93203 Cable Extension Adapter is perfect for you! This adapter lets you extend your cable length up to 100 feet away while still maintaining high definition video and audio quality. So whether you’re relaxing in bed or sitting on the balcony, you can always stay connected to your entertainment.
